job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Below is the Job Details  ltbrgtTitle  Data Scientist AssociateltbrgtLocation Thousand Oaks CA Remote  Need to visit site whenever neededltbrgtContract  13 months with possible extensionltbrgtltbrgtCommentsltbrgt	Flexible commuter local candidates are highly preferred in case they need to go onsiteltbrgt	Some PharmaHealthcare industry experience is a huge plusltbrgt	Must have Databricks and SmartsheetltbrgtDescriptionltbrgt	This ideal candidate will be responsible for providing support to advance artificial intelligence and data analytics efforts by building machine learning models and supporting their implementation and deployment through collaborations with stakeholdersltbrgtResponsibilities includeltbrgt	Build machine learning models through integration of multiple data sourcesltbrgt	Leverage large datasets to conduct endto end analytics that include data gathering and requirements specifications processing analytics and presentationsltbrgt	Interact crossfunctionally with a wide variety of people and teamsltbrgt	Work closely with subject matter experts to deliver value by developing novel practical scientific datadriven solutions to meet business needsltbrgtBasic Qualificationsltbrgt	Bachelors degree mathematics computer science engineering or other quantitative disciplineltbrgtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgt	Knowledge of comprehensive set of data analytics and modeling methods such as unsupervised ie PCA KMeans supervised ie PLS treebased algorithms and deep learning approaches and in their application to biotechnology processesltbrgt	Familiarity working with large data sets data mining and machine learning toolsltbrgt	Familiarity with various artificial intelligence applicationsltbrgt	Proficiency in Python and SQL Programming Languagesltbrgt	Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect organize analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracyltbrgt	Independent selfmotivated organized able to multitask in project environments and skilled in communication facilitation and collaborationltbrgt	Team player prepared to work in and embrace a teambased culture that relies on collaboration for effective decisionmakingltbrgt	Familiarity with DevOps and good software practices ie version control continuous integration test driven development
